name: pdf-reader
label: PDF Reader
description: PDF Reader connector reads PDF documents and extract text.

operations.title: Read all Pages
operations.description: Reads all the pages of the PDF document whose file name and path you have specified.

parameters.title: FortiSOAR File IRI/Filepath
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: Select whether you want to specify the FortiSOAR™ file IRI or path of the PDF file that you want to read using PDF reader.
parameters.description: Select whether you want to specify the FortiSOAR™ file IRI or path of the PDF file that you want to read using PDF reader.

Filepath.title: Filepath
Filepath.name: file_path
Filepath.description: If you select Filepath, then you must specify the complete file path of the PDF file that you want to read using PDF reader.
Filepath.tooltip: If you select Filepath, then you must specify the complete file path of the PDF file that you want to read using PDF reader. files under /tmp directory

FortiSOAR File IRI.title: IRI
FortiSOAR File IRI.name: file_iri
FortiSOAR File IRI.tooltip: If you select FortiSOAR File IRI, then you must specify the IRI of the PDF file in FortiSOAR™ that you want to read using PDF reader.
FortiSOAR File IRI.description: If you select FortiSOAR File IRI, then you must specify the IRI of the PDF file in FortiSOAR™ that you want to read using PDF reader.

parameters.title: Password
parameters.description: Specify the password to access the pdf.
parameters.name: password
parameters.tooltip: Specify the password to access the pdf.
